Graphics driver reference¶

class fcb._gfx.GFX(width, height, pixel, hline=None, vline=None)[source]¶

A class for drawing simple graphics onto the display framebuffer.

circle(x0, y0, radius, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Circle drawing function.

Will draw a single pixel wide circle with center at x0, y0 and with the specified radius.

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the center of the circle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the start of the line
  • radius – The radius of the circle to draw
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
fill_circle(x0, y0, radius, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Filled circle drawing function.

Will draw a filled circle with center at x0, y0 and with the specified radius.

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the center of the circle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the start of the line
  • radius – The radius of the circle to draw
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
fill_rect(x0, y0, width, height, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Filled rectangle drawing function.

Will draw a filled rectangle starting in the upper left x0, y0 position and width, height pixels in size.

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the top left corner of the rectangle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the top left corner of the rectangle
  • height – The height of the rectangle to draw
  • width – The width of the rectangle to draw
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
fill_triangle(x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Filled triangle drawing function.

Will draw a filled triangle around the points (x0, y0), (x1, y1), and (x2, y2).

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the first corner of the triangle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the first corner of the triangle
  • x1 – X component of the location of the second corner of the triangle
  • y1 – Y component of the location of the second corner of the triangle
  • x2 – X component of the location of the third corner of the triangle
  • y2 – Y component of the location of the third corner of the triangle
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
line(x0, y0, x1, y1, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Line drawing function.

Will draw a single pixel wide line starting at x0, y0 and ending at x1, y1.

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the start of the line
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the start of the line
  • x1 – X component of the location of the end of the line
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
rect(x0, y0, width, height, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Rectangle drawing function.

Will draw a single pixel wide non filled rectangle starting in the upper left x0, y0 position and width, height pixels in size.

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the top left corner of the rectangle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the top left corner of the rectangle
  • height – The height of the rectangle to draw
  • width – The width of the rectangle to draw
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
triangle(x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Triangle drawing function.

Will draw a single pixel wide triangle around the points (x0, y0), (x1, y1), and (x2, y2).

Parameters:
  • x0 – X component of the location of the first corner of the triangle
  • y0 – Y component of the location of the first corner of the triangle
  • x1 – X component of the location of the second corner of the triangle
  • y1 – Y component of the location of the second corner of the triangle
  • x2 – X component of the location of the third corner of the triangle
  • y2 – Y component of the location of the third corner of the triangle
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
